title: Roman necropolis at al-Bass
description: The Tyre necropolis, part of the UNESCO World Heritage site of Tyre, contains a triumphal arch and hundreds of stone sarcophagi dated to the Roman and Byzantine periods. It is located adjacent to an older Phoenician burial site.

properties.description: Point representing the location of the Roman/Byzantine necropolis at Tyre el Bass, derived from an OpenStreetMap Node.
